Package jovine360.web

Class Files

java.lang.Object
jovine360.web.Files
public class Files extends Object
Author:
JOSSY This class enables you to perform basic common io operations from creating a file to copying to deleting.

    • createRelativeFile

      public static int createRelativeFile(String folder_name, String filename)
      This method creates a file in the relative path of the folder location passed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      folder_name - specify the directory name
      filename - specify the file name
      Returns:
      0 for success otherwise -1

    • createRelativeContentFile

      public static int createRelativeContentFile(String folder_name, String filename, String msg)
      This method creates a file with content in the relative path of the folder location passed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      folder_name - specify the directory name
      filename - specify the file name to be created
      msg - represent the content to be written to the file upon creation.
      Returns:
      0 for success otherwise -1

      Returns:
